Info.Title: Hulk
Info.Writer: Stan Lee (Marvel comic book character), Jack Kirby (Marvel comic book character), James Schamus (story), John Turman (screenplay), Michael France (screenplay), James Schamus (screenplay)
Info.Actors: Eric Bana, Jennifer Connelly, Sam Elliott, Josh Lucas
Info.Plot: Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.
